labels.name: package
labels.value: src.test.resources.features.SearchProduct_feature.Verify adding a monitor to cart on Amazon portal

name: As a customer when I search for Monitor, I want to see if the first selected item price is consistency after adding to the cart.

steps.name: Given  the user navigates to Amazon India Portal
Then  Verify the title of the Home Page
When  I type "Monitor" in the Search field and press Enter
Then  List of searched product  should be displayed
And  I select the first item
And  I add the item to the cart by clicking on Add to Cart
